Hi All,

I downloaded source codeÂ from this site and tried to open in Visual Studio .NEt 2003. But it does not open. Any suggestions?


Thanks

NAudio is developed using Visual Studio .NET 2008. Try downloading the express edition and using that. Also, I have a feeling that VS2003 didn't support .NET 2.0. The NAudio solution uses .NET 2.0 and has one sub-project using .NET 3.5.

Mark
